item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, April 13, 2025 at 11:10 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Whenever – typed and DST-safe datetimes for Python (48 points | 12 comments)
2. Experimental release of GrapheneOS for Pixel 9a (255 points | 126 comments)
3. BPS is a GPS alternative that nobody's heard of (232 points | 84 comments)
4. Show HN: Chonky – a neural approach for text semantic chunking (56 points | 11 comments)
5. Nice things with SVG (443 points | 74 comments)
6. I ditched my laptop for a pocketable mini PC and a pair of AR glasses (186 points | 125 comments)
7. Go channels are bad (2016) (29 points | discuss)
8. How to not build a two stage model rocket (67 points | 10 comments)
9. WebTUI – A CSS Library That Brings the Beauty of Terminal UIs to the Browser (171 points | 55 comments)
10. Philip K. Dick: Stanisław Lem Is a Communist Committee (17 points | 3 comments)
11. Emacs Lisp Elements (266 points | 37 comments)
12. A Farewell to the ArcoLinux University (51 points | 9 comments)
13. YAML: The Norway Problem (2022) (151 points | 92 comments)
14. Open source and self hostable/private file converter (512 points | 98 comments)
15. Show HN: memEx, a personal knowledge base inspired by zettlekasten and org-mode (150 points | 22 comments)
16. Cross-Entropy and KL Divergence (28 points | 2 comments)
17. Monty Python and the Holy Grail became a comedy legend (68 points | 37 comments)
18. Why is there a “small house” in IBM's Code page 437? (153 points | 36 comments)
19. How to repair the parts that explode in Lenovo Yoga laptops (42 points | 14 comments)
20. ESA has a commercial launch strategy, but will member states pay? (25 points | 31 comments)
21. CERN releases report on the feasibility of a possible Future Circular Collider (102 points | 76 comments)
22. The Bitter Prediction (125 points | 101 comments)
23. ArkType: Ergonomic TS validator 100x faster than Zod (156 points | 55 comments)
24. Dust in the wind: How cities alter natural airborne particles (29 points | 1 comment)
25. Tunarr: Create and configure live TV channels from media on your servers (175 points | 47 comments)
26. Numbers and Unicorns (9 points | 1 comment)
27. Microgravity 101 (10 points | 2 comments)
28. 33-year-old AmigaOS for Commodore computers gets an unexpected update News (69 points | 9 comments)
29. How to Structure a B2B Marketplace Venture (31 points | discuss)
30. Trump exempts phones, computers, chips from ‘reciprocal’ tariffs (309 points | 611 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, April 13, 2025 at 11:10 AM UTC
